headline: Relevant combination of experience in the financial industry (capital markets and securities regulation), and knowledge of accounting, software engineering and business. I'm interested in tech, innovation and startups

experiences.title: Capital Markets Analyst
experiences.description:
Working in the Brazilian SEC on securities offerings, public company and investment funds compliance and reporting. Experience with risk based oversight of funds and asset management companies. 

Since May 2023, acting as project manager for an application designed to automate securities offerings, in collaboration with a diverse team of developers, shareholders, and industry associations.

Main experience:

Conduct analysis of complex financial data related to securities offerings, mergers and acquisitions and other capital market activities.
Contribute to the development and implementation of regulatory policies and guidelines.
Collaborate with other regulatory bodies and industry associations to promote best practices and harmonization of standards.

experiences.title: Assistant Controller
experiences.description:
Worked to ensure a successful integration of energy generation assets after its acquisition by Dresser Rand Corporation.
Implemented a comprehensive international reporting system compliant to American regulatory deadlines and requirements, including SEC reporting and GAAP accounting standards.

Main experience:

Collaborate with cross-function teams to gather and analyze financial data and implement solutions to enhance financial performance and mitigate risk.
Provide accurate and timely financial analysis, reporting, and forecasting to senior management.

experiences.title: Controlling Analyst
experiences.description: Responsible for overseeing the preparation of balance sheets, profit and loss reports and other financial statements, ensuring accuracy and completeness of financial data, as well as compliance with accounting standards and regulations.

education.school: Inteli - Instituto de Tecnologia e Liderança
ETEC - Escola Técnica Estadual de São Paulo

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Union Heritage Tokenization Hackathon
accomplishment_honors_awards.description:
Award in recognition of the Plataforma Iby project in the category of "Destination of Union assets".

Link: https://desafios.enap.gov.br/pt/desafios/hackathon-web3-tokenizacao-do-patrimonio-da-uniao

accomplishment_projects.title: Iby Platform
accomplishment_projects.description: During the Hackathon Web3 – Tokenization of the Union"s Heritage, I had the opportunity to develop a platform to simplify the transfer of government properties through the sale of NFTs to companies and real estate funds for a specified period. Each NFT allows semi-annual use of the property and is liquid, being tradable for the remaining period of the initial term.
